name.description: The name of the recorder. Defaults to `default`. Changing it recreates the resource.

roleArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role. Used to make read or write requests to the delivery channel and to describe the AWS resources associated with the account. See [AWS Docs](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/config/latest/developerguide/iamrole-permissions.html) for more details.
